assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethics approval was obtained through Peter MacCallum Cancer Centre Ethics Committee (EC00235) Project number 17/194L. All procedures performed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the institutional research committee and with the 1964 Helsinki declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All participants, including consumers, signed written informed consent forms approved by the ethics committee.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Signed participant and information consent form included consent for publication.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
